fields.title: Double Chocolate Brownies
fields.ingredients:
Granulated Sugar (150g)
All-Purpose Flour (200g)
Cocoa Powder (50g)
Powdered Sugar (100g)
Dark Chocolate Chips (50g)
Sea Salt (pinch)
Large Eggs x2
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 200째c. Lightly spray an 8x8 baking dish with cooking spray and line it with parchment paper. Spray the parchment paper.
2. In a medium bowl, combine the sugar, flour, cocoa powder, powdered sugar, chocolate chips, and salt.
3. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs.
4. Sprinkle the dry mix over the eggs and stir until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into the prepared pan and use a spatula to smooth the top. Bake for 40 to 48 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out with only a few crumbs attached.
6. Cool completely before slicing.

fields.title: Mac and Cheese
fields.description: A cheesy dish with 3 different cheeses!
fields.ingredients:
Macaroni (250g)
Cheddar Cheese (300g)
Mozzarella Cheese (150g)
Butter (50g)
All-Purpose Flour (50g)
Milk (600ml)
Mustard Powder (1 tsp)
Garlic Powder (1/2 tsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper (to taste)
Breadcrumbs: 50g (optional, for topping)
fields.instructions:
1. Boil water in a large pot, add the macaroni, and cook until al dente. Drain and set aside.
2. In a saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Stir in the flour for 2 minutes, then gradually whisk in the milk until thickened. Add the grated cheddar and mozzarella, stirring until melted.
3. Mix in the mustard powder, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper, adjusting to taste.
4. Combine Pasta and Sauce: Stir the cooked macaroni into the cheese sauce until well coated.
5. For a crunchy topping, transfer to a baking dish, sprinkle with breadcrumbs, and bake at 180째c or 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

fields.title: Margherita Pizza
fields.description: A simple Italian pizza with fresh toppings.
fields.ingredients:
Pizza Dough (250g)
Tomato Sauce (200g)
Mozzarella Cheese (250g)
Olive Oil (2 tbsp)
Dried Oregano (1 tsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper (to taste)
Fresh Basil (optional)
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 220째c.
2. On a floured surface, roll out the pizza dough into your desired thickness. Transfer to a baking sheet or pizza stone.
3. Spread the tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border for the crust. Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese on top.
4. Season with salt, black pepper, and dried oregano. Drizzle olive oil over the top for extra flavour.
5. Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh basil if desired, and slice to serve.

fields.title: Baked Ziti
fields.description: A pasta dish baked with cheesy sauce.
fields.ingredients:
Ziti Pasta (250g)
Marinara Sauce (500g)
Ricotta Cheese (250g)
Mozzarella Cheese (200g)
Parmesan Cheese (50g)
Egg x1
Garlic Powder (1/2 tsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper (to taste)
Fresh Basil (optional)
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 190째c.
2. Boil salted water in a large pot, add the ziti pasta, and cook until al dente. Drain and set aside.
3. In a bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, egg, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Mix until smooth.
4. In a baking dish, spread a layer of marinara sauce on the bottom. Layer half of the cooked ziti, followed by half of the ricotta mixture, half of the mozzarella, and another layer of marinara. Repeat the layers with the remaining ziti, ricotta, and sauce. Top with the remaining mozzarella and Parmesan cheese.
5. Cover with foil and bake for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 10-15 minutes, or until the cheese is golden and bubbly.
6. Garnish with fresh basil if desired, then serve.

fields.title: Caprese Salad
fields.description: A fresh salad with balsamic and basil.
fields.ingredients:
Fresh Mozzarella (250g)
Tomatoes x3
Fresh Basil Leaves (handful)
Olive Oil (2 tbsp)
Balsamic Vinegar (1 tbsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper (to taste)
fields.instructions:
1. Slice the fresh mozzarella and tomatoes into even slices. Rinse and pat dry the basil leaves.
2. On a serving platter, alternate layers of sliced mozzarella and tomatoes, slightly overlapping them.
3. Tuck fresh basil leaves between the layers of mozzarella and tomatoes for flavor and presentation.
4. Drizzle olive oil over the salad. If desired, add balsamic vinegar for extra tanginess. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
5. Let the salad sit for a few minutes to allow the flavours to meld, then serve immediately.

fields.title: Berry Compote Pancakes
fields.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup.
fields.ingredients:
All-Purpose Flour (200g)
Baking Powder (2 tsp)
Sugar (2 tbsp)
Salt (1/2 tsp)
Milk (300ml)
Egg x1
Butter (50g)
Mixed Berries (300g)
Maple Syrup (optional)
fields.instructions:
1. In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the mixed berries and 2 tablespoons of sugar. Cook until the berries break down and the mixture thickens, about 5-7 minutes. Set aside.
2. In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In another bowl, mix the milk, egg, and melted butter. Combine the wet and dry ingredients until just mixed (it's okay if there are some lumps).
3. Heat a non-stick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Pour about 1/4 cup of pancake batter onto the skillet for each pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface (about 2-3 minutes), then flip and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until golden brown.
4. Serve the Pancakes: Stack the pancakes on plates and top with the warm berry compote.
5. If desired, drizzle with maple syrup for added sweetness, then serve immediately.

fields.title: Mushroom Risotto
fields.ingredients:
Arborio Rice (250g)
Mushrooms (300g)
Onion x1
Garlic (2 cloves)
Vegetable Broth (1L)
White Wine (100ml)
Parmesan Cheese (50g)
Butter (50g)
Olive Oil (2 tbsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper: to taste
Fresh Parsley: for garnish (optional)
fields.instructions:
1. In a large saucepan, heat the olive oil and half of the butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic, cooking until soft and translucent. Stir in the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and begin to brown.
2. Add the Arborio rice to the pan, stirring for about 2 minutes until the rice is lightly toasted and coated with the oil.
3. If using, pour in the white wine and cook until absorbed, stirring constantly.
4. Begin adding the warm vegetable broth one ladle at a time, stirring frequently. Allow the liquid to be absorbed before adding the next ladle.
5. Continue this process for about 18-20 minutes, until the rice is creamy and al dente.
6. Stir in the remaining butter and grated Parmesan cheese, and season with salt and black pepper to taste. Garnish with fresh parsley if desired, and serve hot.

fields.title: Thai Green Curry
fields.description: A fragrant Thai green curry with chicken.
fields.ingredients:
Coconut Milk (400ml)
Green Curry Paste (3 tbsp)
Chicken Breast or Tofu (300g)
Mixed Vegetables (200g)
Fish Sauce (2 tbsp)
Brown Sugar (1 tbsp)
Lime Juice (1 tbsp)
Fresh Basil Leaves (a handful)
Vegetable Oil (2 tbsp)
Jasmine Rice (for serving)
fields.instructions:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the chicken or tofu and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add the green curry paste and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant. Pour in the coconut milk and stir to combine.
3. Bring the mixture to a gentle simmer, then add the mixed vegetables. Cook for about 5-7 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
4. Return the cooked chicken or tofu to the skillet. Stir in the fish sauce, brown sugar, and lime juice. Simmer for another 2-3 minutes to heat through.
5. Remove from heat, stir in fresh basil leaves, and serve hot over jasmine rice.

fields.title: Lemon and Garlic Salmon
fields.description: A healthy salmon dish with lemon and garlic.
fields.ingredients:
Salmon Fillets x4
Lemon x1
Garlic (3 cloves)
Olive Oil (3 tbsp)
Fresh Parsley (2 tbsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper (to taste)
fields.instructions:
1. Preheat your oven to 200째c.
2. In a small bowl, mix together the lemon juice, lemon zest, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and black pepper.
3. Place the salmon fillets in a baking dish and pour the marinade over them. Let them marinate for about 15-20 minutes.
4. Bake the marinated salmon in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon flakes easily with a fork and is cooked through.
5. Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve with your choice of sides, such as rice or steamed vegetables.

fields.title: Beef Stroganoff
fields.description: A creamy and rich hearty dish!
fields.ingredients:
Beef Sirloin (300g,)
Mushrooms (200g)
Onion x1
Garlic (2 cloves,)
Beef Broth (250ml)
Sour Cream (150g)
Flour (2 tbsp)
Butter (2 tbsp)
Olive Oil (1 tbsp)
Salt (to taste)
Black Pepper: to taste
Paprika: 1 tsp
Egg Noodles: for serving
fields.instructions:
1. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced beef and season with salt, black pepper, and paprika. Sear until browned (about 3-4 minutes), then remove and set aside.
2. In the same skillet, add butter and saut챕 the chopped onion and minced garlic until soft. Add the sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their moisture and are golden brown.
3. Sprinkle the flour over the mushrooms and stir for about 1 minute. Gradually pour in the beef broth, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens.
4. Return the cooked beef to the skillet and stir in the sour cream. Simmer for a few minutes to heat through and combine the flavours.
5. Serve the beef stroganoff over cooked egg noodles, garnishing with fresh parsley if desired.
